EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Utilities Moderniz.-Email-CEPSI BKFST Invit-T00293.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for a Breakfast workshop at CEPSI 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Energize your day with new insights on analytics and an architecture for the next generation utility Join Nokia for a complimentary breakfast workshop! Wednesday, 19 September, 2018 7:30am to 8:45am at Mandarin Oriental Hotel Featured utility and Nokia presentations and discussions on progressive topics:
- Optimizing grid operations, asset planning, and grid resiliency with asset and outage intelligence using analytics and machine learning - A visionary architecture for transformation to new business models for the next generation utility
A full buffet style breakfast will be available with chilled juices, tea and coffee, fresh fruit, delicious pastries, and a large selection of hot favorites.
Breakfast will be hosted in the Amber Room on level 2. The Amber Room is located less than a 3 minute walk from the middle exhibition halls 5 & 6 at the Kuala Lumpur Convention Center.
Don’t miss this opportunity space is limited!!
Register for the Nokia breakfast workshop <[[https://www.eiseverywhere.com/cepsi-breakfast-2018]]>
Mandarin Oriental Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
